name: Battle Monk
description:
Battle Monk is a turn-based auto-fight card game. 
The players need to fight with all kind of monsters in a mystery tower, and get to the hight level. By defeat the monsters of each level, the player will gain bulk of rewards. All the player characters are NFTs generated randomly from thouthands of hand-draw elements. The owner can change the outlook of the character by keep playing the game and trade them on the market as well.
